title: What are the best ways to choose the topics for tech blogging? - Quora

response.answer_text: For a Tech blog you should focus on the latest tech stuff that is released every nowadays. It will engage your audience most as being a tech-savy I always love to know about knew thing. You can also reveal the uncommon gadgets that are released behind the screens, You could follow other tech blogs or tech channels on youtube to know about these things. You can also unbox products and write reviews. If you don’t get sponsors then watch videos and get an idea about the product and write reviews. You can also write about android hacks, iphone hacks and something that are trending. You can also use stumbleupon to get ideas

Tech blogging can be of various types and categories. Whatever you find suitable for your writing style you should consider them like coding languages, mobile technology, map technology, car technology. TechCrunch is one of those technology blogs you can look to for reference as to how they did it. Lifehacker, Cnet, Gizmodo, The verge and thenextweb are some of the others you can also check too.
